sqlMap.select: /* PEDMWEB0001.selectVendorException */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TED_PO_VENDOR_EXCEPTION WHERE VEN_CD = #venCd# AND ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD')

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectStoreOrdListTotCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT M1.STR_CD FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE@dl_md_martnis ST ON M1.STR_CD = ST.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD')
ST.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
AND M1.STR_CD
#strCds[]#
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NOT NULL
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NULL
M1.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
M1.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'
GROUP BY M1.STR_CD )

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectStoreOrdList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT M1.STR_CD AS STR_CD ,M1.VEN_NM AS VEN_NM ,M1.ORD_DY AS ORD_DY ,M2.STR_NM AS STR_NM ,NVL(SUM(S3.ORD_QTY), 0) AS ORD_TOT_QTY ,NVL(SUM(S3.ORD_QTY*S3.ORD_IPSU*S3.ORD_BUY_PRC), 0) AS ORD_TOT_PRC ,NVL(SUM(S3.ORD_QTY*S3.ORD_IPSU), 0) AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,CASE WHEN S1.ORD_TOT_QTY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS UP_YN ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD AS ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM AS CD_NM ,S1.ORD_REQ_NO AS ORD_REQ_NO ,COUNT(*) AS PROD_TOT_SUM FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE@dl_md_martnis M2 ON M1.STR_CD = M2.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_PROD S3 ON S3.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S3.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.STR_CD = S3.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S3.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S3.VEN_CD AND M1.PROD_CD = S3.PROD_CD
S3.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
S3.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'
LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_CODE S2 ON S2.MAJOR_CD='WPO01' AND S1.ORD_PRGS_CD = S2.MINOR_CD WHERE M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd#
M2.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
AND M1.STR_CD
#strCds[]#
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NOT NULL
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NULL
M1.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
M1.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'
GROUP BY M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_NM ,M2.STR_NM ,M1.ORD_DY ,S1.ORD_TOT_QTY ,S1.ORD_TOT_PRC ,S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM ,S1.ORD_REQ_NO ,M2.AREA_FG, M2.SORT_ORDER ORDER BY M2.AREA_FG, M2.SORT_ORDER ) A )A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startRowNo# AND #endRowNo#

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectStoreOrdList_FixedStrCd */ SELECT M1.STR_CD AS STR_CD ,M1.VEN_NM AS VEN_NM ,M1.ORD_DY AS ORD_DY ,M2.STR_NM AS STR_NM ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_QTY ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_PRC , '0') AS ORD_TOT_PRC ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,CASE WHEN S1.ORD_TOT_QTY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS UP_YN ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD AS ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM AS CD_NM ,S1.ORD_REQ_NO AS ORD_REQ_NO ,COUNT(*) AS PROD_TOT_SUM FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 ,( SELECT NVL(SUM(M1.ORD_QTY), 0) AS ORD_TOT_QTY_SUM ,NVL(SUM(M1.ORD_QTY*M1.ORD_IPSU*M1.ORD_BUY_PRC) , 0) AS ORD_TOT_PRC_SUM ,NVL(SUM(M1.ORD_QTY*M1.ORD_IPSU), 0) AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY_SUM FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE@dl_md_martnis ST ON M1.STR_CD = ST.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD')
) INNER JOIN STORE M2 ON M1.STR_CD = M2.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_CODE S2 ON S2.MAJOR_CD='WPO01' AND S1.ORD_PRGS_CD = S2.MINOR_CD WHERE M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd#
M2.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
AND M1.STR_CD
#strCds[]#
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NOT NULL
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NULL
GROUP BY M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_NM ,M2.STR_NM ,M1.ORD_DY ,S1.ORD_TOT_QTY ,S1.ORD_TOT_PRC ,S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM ,S1.ORD_REQ_NO ,M2.AREA_FG, M2.SORT_ORDER ORDER BY M2.AREA_FG, M2.SORT_ORDER

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectStoreOrdCntSum */ SELECT NVL(SUM(M1.ORD_QTY), '0') AS ORD_TOT_QTY_SUM ,NVL(SUM(M1.ORD_QTY*M1.ORD_IPSU*M1.ORD_BUY_PRC) , '0') AS ORD_TOT_PRC_SUM ,NVL(SUM(M1.ORD_QTY*M1.ORD_IPSU), '0') AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY_SUM FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE@dl_md_martnis ST ON M1.STR_CD = ST.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD')
ST.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
AND M1.STR_CD
#strCds[]#
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NOT NULL
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NULL
M1.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
M1.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectOrdMstInfo */ SELECT A.PROD_CD ,A.STR_CD ,A.VEN_CD ,A.ORD_DY ,A.SRCMK_CD ,A.PROD_NM ,A.PROD_STD ,A.ORD_BUY_PRC ,A.ORD_UNIT ,B.ORD_QTY ,A.ORD_IPSU ,B.ORD_REQ_NO FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_PROD B ON B.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND B.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND B.STR_CD = #strCd# AND A.VEN_CD = B.VEN_CD AND A.ORD_DY = B.ORD_DY AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD WHERE A.STR_CD = #strCd# AND A.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND A.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD')
A.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
A.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'
ORDER BY A.PROD_CD
/* PEDMWEB0001.selectOrdReqNo */ SELECT ORD_REQ_NO FROM TED_PO_ORD_MST WHERE VEN_CD = #venCd# AND ORD_DY = #ordDy# AND STR_CD = #strCd#
sqlMap.insert: /* PEDMWEB0001.insertOrdMstInfo */ INSERT INTO TED_PO_ORD_MST ( ORD_REQ_NO ,VEN_CD ,VEN_NM ,STR_CD ,ORD_DY ,ORD_VSEQ ,ORD_TOT_QTY ,ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,ORD_TOT_PRC ,ORD_TOT_STK_QTY ,ORD_PRGS_CD ,PROC_EMP_NO ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DT ) SELECT M1.ORD_REQ_NO ,M1.VEN_CD ,(SELECT max(VEN_NM) FROM TED_VENDOR WHERE VEN_CD = #venCd# ) AS VEN_NM ,M1.STR_CD ,M1.ORD_DY ,'1' ORD_VSEQ ,NULL ORD_TOT_QTY ,NULL ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,NULL ORD_TOT_PRC ,NULL ORD_TOT_STK_QTY ,'02' ORD_PRGS_CD ,NULL PROC_EMP_NO ,#venCd# REG_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) REG_DT ,#venCd# MOD_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) MOD_DT FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD M1 WHERE VEN_CD = #venCd# AND ORD_DY = #ordDy# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT ORD_REQ_NO FROM TED_PO_ORD_MST M2 WHERE M1.ORD_REQ_NO = M2.ORD_REQ_NO ) GROUP BY ORD_REQ_NO, VEN_CD, ORD_DY, STR_CD

/* PEDMWEB0001.insertOrdProdInfo */ INSERT INTO TED_PO_ORD_PROD ( ORD_REQ_NO, PROD_CD, ORD_DY, STR_CD, VEN_CD ,SRCMK_CD, PROD_NM, SHORT_NM, L4_CD, PROD_STD ,ORD_IPSU, ORD_UNIT, ORD_SALE_PRC, ORD_BUY_PRC, ORD_QTY ,ORD_CFM_QTY, ORD_STK_QTY, REG_STS_CD, MD_MOD_CD, REG_ID ,REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_DT, L1_CD ) SELECT NVL(M2.ORD_REQ_NO, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0),'YYMMDD')||LPAD(SQ_PO_ORD_MST_SEQ.NEXTVAL,6,'0')) AS ORD_REQ_NO ,M1.PROD_CD ,M1.ORD_DY ,M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_CD
,M1.SRCMK_CD ,M1.PROD_NM ,M1.SHORT_NM ,M1.L4_CD ,M1.PROD_STD
,M1.ORD_IPSU ,M1.ORD_UNIT ,M1.ORD_SALE_PRC ,M1.ORD_BUY_PRC ,#ordQty#
,#ordQty# ,'0' ,#regStsCd# ,#mdModCd#
,#venCd# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ,#venCd# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ,L1_CD
FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ORD_REQ_NO, VEN_CD, ORD_DY, STR_CD FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD WHERE VEN_CD = #venCd# AND ORD_DY = #ordDy# AND STR_CD = #strCd# GROUP BY ORD_REQ_NO, VEN_CD, ORD_DY, STR_CD ) M2 ON M1.STR_CD = M2.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = M2.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = M2.VEN_CD WHERE M1.STR_CD = #strCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = #ordDy# AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.PROD_CD = #prodCd#
sqlMap.update: /* PEDMWEB0001.updateOrdProdInfo */ UPDATE TED_PO_ORD_PROD SET ORD_QTY = #ordQty# ,ORD_CFM_QTY = #ordQty# ,MOD_ID = #modId# ,MOD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) WHERE PROD_CD = #prodCd# AND STR_CD = #strCd# AND VEN_CD = #venCd# AND ORD_DY = #ordDy#

/* PEDMWEB0001.updateOrdMstProdSum */ UPDATE TED_PO_ORD_MST M1 SET ( ORD_TOT_QTY ,ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,ORD_TOT_PRC ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DT ) = (SELECT SUM(M2.ORD_QTY) AS ORD_TOT_QTY ,SUM(M2.ORD_IPSU * M2.ORD_QTY) AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,SUM((M2.ORD_IPSU * M2.ORD_QTY) * M2.ORD_BUY_PRC) AS ORD_TOT_PRC ,#venCd# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD M2 WHERE M1.ORD_REQ_NO = M2.ORD_REQ_NO AND M2.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M2.ORD_DY = #ordDy# ) WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = #ordDy#
sqlMap.delete: /* PEDMWEB0001.deleteOrdProdInfo */ DELETE FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD WHERE ORD_REQ_NO = #ordReqNo# AND PROD_CD = #prodCd#

/* PEDMWEB0001.deleteInOrdProdInfo */ DELETE FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD WHERE ORD_REQ_NO = #ordReqNo# AND PROD_CD
#prodCds[]#
sqlMap.select: /* PEDMWEB0001.selectProdCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD WHERE ORD_REQ_NO = #ordReqNo#
sqlMap.delete: /* PEDMWEB0001.deleteAllOrdMst */ DELETE TED_PO_ORD_MST M1 WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT M2.ORD_REQ_NO FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD M2 WHERE M1.ORD_REQ_NO = M2.ORD_REQ_NO ) AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = #ordDy#
sqlMap.select: /* PEDMWEB0001.selectAppReqCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TED_PO_ORD_MST M1 WHERE M1.ORD_PRGS_CD = '02' AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD')

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectAppReqChkCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT M1.PROD_CD ,M1.ORD_DY ,M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_CD FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD M1 WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = #ordDy# MINUS SELECT M1.PROD_CD ,M1.ORD_DY ,M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_CD FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = #ordDy# )

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectAppReqFailInfo */ SELECT M1.PROD_CD ,M1.ORD_DY ,M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_CD FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD M1 WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = #ordDy# MINUS SELECT M1.PROD_CD ,M1.ORD_DY ,M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_CD FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = #ordDy#
sqlMap.update: /* PEDMWEB0001.updateOrdMstState */ UPDATE TED_PO_ORD_MST SET ORD_PRGS_CD = '02' ,MOD_ID = #modId# ,MOD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) WHERE VEN_CD = #venCd# AND ORD_DY = #ordDy#

/* PEDMWEB0001.updateOrdProdState */ UPDATE TED_PO_ORD_PROD SET MD_MOD_CD = '03' ,MOD_ID = #modId# ,MOD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) WHERE VEN_CD = #venCd# AND ORD_DY = #ordDy# AND STR_CD = #strCd# AND PROD_CD = #prodCd#
sqlMap.select:
/* PEDMWEB0001.selectStoreOrdListTotCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT M1.STR_CD AS STR_CD ,M2.STR_NM AS STR_NM ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_QTY ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_PRC , '0') AS ORD_TOT_PRC ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,CASE WHEN S1.ORD_TOT_QTY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS UP_YN ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD AS ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM AS CD_NM FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 INNER JOIN STORE M2 ON M1.STR_CD = M2.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD AND S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_CODE S2 ON S2.MAJOR_CD='WPO01' AND S1.ORD_PRGS_CD = S2.MINOR_CD WHERE M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd#
M2.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NOT NULL
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NULL
GROUP BY M1.STR_CD ,M2.STR_NM ,S1.ORD_TOT_QTY ,S1.ORD_TOT_PRC ,S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM )

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectStoreOrdList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT M1.STR_CD AS STR_CD ,M1.VEN_NM AS VEN_NM ,M1.ORD_DY AS ORD_DY ,M2.STR_NM AS STR_NM ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_QTY ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_PRC , '0') AS ORD_TOT_PRC ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,CASE WHEN S1.ORD_TOT_QTY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS UP_YN ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD AS ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM AS CD_NM ,S1.ORD_REQ_NO AS ORD_REQ_NO FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 INNER JOIN STORE M2 ON M1.STR_CD = M2.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD AND S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_CODE S2 ON S2.MAJOR_CD='WPO01' AND S1.ORD_PRGS_CD = S2.MINOR_CD WHERE M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd#
M2.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NOT NULL
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NULL
GROUP BY M1.STR_CD ,M1.VEN_NM ,M2.STR_NM ,M1.ORD_DY ,S1.ORD_TOT_QTY ,S1.ORD_TOT_PRC ,S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM ,S1.ORD_REQ_NO ORDER BY M1.STR_CD ) A )A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startRowNo# AND #endRowNo#

/* PEDMWEB0001.selectStoreOrdCntSum */ SELECT SUM(A.ORD_TOT_QTY) AS ORD_TOT_QTY_SUM ,SUM(A.ORD_TOT_PRC) AS ORD_TOT_PRC_SUM ,SUM(A.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY) AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY_SUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT M1.STR_CD AS STR_CD ,M2.STR_NM AS STR_NM ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_QTY ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_PRC , '0') AS ORD_TOT_PRC ,NVL(S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY, '0') AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,CASE WHEN S1.ORD_TOT_QTY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS UP_YN ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD AS ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM AS CD_NM FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 INNER JOIN STORE M2 ON M1.STR_CD = M2.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_MST S1 ON M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = S1.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = S1.VEN_CD AND S1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND S1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_CODE S2 ON S2.MAJOR_CD='WPO01' AND S1.ORD_PRGS_CD = S2.MINOR_CD WHERE M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd#
M2.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NOT NULL
S1.ORD_REQ_NO IS NULL
M1.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
M1.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'
GROUP BY M1.STR_CD ,M2.STR_NM ,S1.ORD_TOT_QTY ,S1.ORD_TOT_PRC ,S1.ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY ,S1.ORD_PRGS_CD ,S2.CD_NM ORDER BY M1.STR_CD ) A )A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startRowNo# AND #endRowNo#
